newsitem.title: USA: Bayer to announce U.S. investment plans.
newsitem.headline: Bayer to announce U.S. investment plans.

text.p: German chemical and drugs group Bayer AG will announce plans Wednesday to invest billions of dollars in its U.S. operations, a company spokesman said Tuesday.
President and chief executive Helge Wehmeier will give details in a telephone conference with reporters starting at 1100 EST/1600 GMT.

Wehmeier also will give the results of Bayer's 1996 operations in the United States. Bayer has about 24,000 U.S. employees and the United States accounts for a quarter of the company's worldwide sales, the spokesman said.
